metadata.title: USN-4061-1 -- Redis vulnerabilities
metadata.description: It was discovered that Redis incorrectly handled the hyperloglog data structure. An attacker could use this issue to cause Redis to crash, resulting in a denial of service, or possibly execute arbitrary code.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-4061-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  redis-sentinel - 2:3.0.6-1ubuntu0.4 redis-server - 2:3.0.6-1ubuntu0.4 redis-tools - 2:3.0.6-1ubuntu0.4 No subscription required
